title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Cayo Perico Motor Wars: New Mode with 2X Rewards
content:
The lush, sprawling grounds of El Rubio’s private island are now a chaotic new battleground in Cayo Perico Motor Wars, a tropical twist on the classic mode that’s dealing out 2X GTA$ and RP for the next two weeks.

Drop into one of six fast-shrinking areas that force you into a fight, then survive and dominate to take the win. Whether you take to the skies, control the roads, or stalk the underbrush, supremacy is the only goal.
